item.description:
I've set this meetup event for those that don't celebrate Christmas, or find themselves with that evening free and would like to get out of the house for a few hours. Join us for dinner at the Royal Buffet in Manchester, and then if you'd like we can check out a movie afterwards.

The buffet has everything to offer, from American, Italian, Chinese, steak, seafood, barbecue, seafood, and more.

For more details:

http://www.restaurant...

There are some great movies coming out before or on Christmas day: I'm thinking about seeing Sherlock Holmes which is opening that day, but there are other interesting movies (such as Avatar) that we can go see as well.

UPDATE: Sherlock Holmes will be starting at 7:40PM. Since this is opening day for this movie, I recommend that you get tickets ahead of time to ensure that you get a seat since it may sell out.

For those who want to meet just for the movie, I am meeting everyone in the theatre lobby, by the entrance of Chatters at 7:25.


Of course, you don't have to attend both events: join us just for dinner, or just for the movie. Just let me know which event you're going to attend.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet by the front door-I look like my picture and I'll place a "Meetup" Sign on the table

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Dinner and a Movie: Christmas Day
